extension.name: Amount in Words
extension.description: In Germany, a donation confirmation is neccessary for most donations. Furthermore, every confirmation needs the total amount of yearly donations in an written form, e.g. one thousand two hundred forty two Euros. This module extends smarty with a function, that is easy to use in a proper template for those donation confirmations. It simply takes a numeric value and outputs the written amount. Works for values lower then 1 billion aka 1.000.000.000,00 .
